dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3689 IH: American Aviation Diversity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Espaillat (for himself, Ms. Barragán, Mr. Carson, Mr. Cárdenas, and Ms. Velázquez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To authorize appropriations for the Minority Serving Institutions Intern Program of the Federal Aviation Administration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the American Aviation Diversity Act.
There is authorized to be appropriated $7,500,000 for each fiscal year for the Minority Serving Institutions Intern Program of the Federal Aviation Administration.
